product_name: Spenco 2nd Skin blister Kit - Package of 24
long_description: The Spenco 2nd Skin(R) blister kit helps you prevent and manage blisters while you're logging miles on the trail. Contains six 1 x 1 in. 2nd Skin moist pads, six 3 x 1.5 adhesive knit strips, one 5 x 3 in. adhesive knit strip and one 5 x 3 in. sheet of Pressure Pad ovals. 2nd Skin moist pads are used to protect against pressure, friction and blistering; moist pads cool and soothe on contact and won't stick to skin. Adhesive knit strips help prevent blisters and hold the 2nd Skin moist pads in place; strips stretch and conform to your body. Pressure Pads protect hot spots on the skin, especially at the joints of feet, hands, knees and elbows.
short_description: The Spenco 2nd Skin(R) blister kit helps you prevent and manage blisters while you're logging miles on the trail.
